about.contactForm.head: Reach out to us
about.contactForm.subHead: We love to hear form travelers and share stories together. We get back to you within 24 hours
about.contactForm.subject: Subject
about.contactForm.tollFree: Call Toll Free until 2 pm EST
about.landingPageTitle: At Aeroura Travel we believe in empowering individuals through global service and travel so that we can learn from each other, by sharing ideas.
about.missionMessage: To provide friendly quality service to travelers seeking cultural experiences
about.team.head: Our Adventurous Team
about.team.teamText1: This person enjoys traveling to other countries, meeting new people and exchanging ideas. Travel is an adventure, and just going outdoors is a start. Exploring the world is part of his DNA and he is always looking for an adventure. Time is one thing we can not get back and planning is the best way to take full advantage of that.
about.values.communicationText: Communication is clear and concise, and always necessary throughout
about.values.head: Our Values
about.values.honestyText: We stand by the truth and what's best for our customers, even if it may cost us business
about.values.resourceText: We may not always have the answer but we are committed to finding it
about.visionMessage: All people feel empowered through technology in global service and travel.
landing.page.subtitle: Places to See
landing.page.title: Experience the World
specialize.description1: Relax & enjoy. There's not much else to it and we're just fine with that. A Trip for the entire family or a solo adventure is just around the corner.
specialize.description2: There's magic in planning and we can't get enough of it. We enjoy planning your vacation, weekend getaways, and family retreats.
specialize.description3: The best and brightest come to New York. There's no place like it so reach out to us to get the ins-and-outs of our booming city. We love it and we know you will too.
specialize.title: We Specialize in
travelBanner.title: NYC Travel
virtualHoursForm.additionalInfo: E.g. Number of travelers, duration, travel dates, level of accommodations
virtualHoursForm.disclaimer1: We ask you for your number so that one of our specialists can call you or text you to discuss your travel plans. Standard rates may apply. By submitting this form, you agree to us getting in touch with you in this way.
virtualHoursForm.disclaimer2: Your privacy is paramount to Aeroura Travel and we will never share your personal data with anyone. For further info, please see our privacy policy.
virtualHoursForm.request: Request your appointment and a specialist will be in touch to confirm a date and time to suit you
virtualHoursForm.subtitle: Meet with our friendly representatives via video chat to plan your future trips.
